title: Into the Unknown achievement in Stellaris (Windows)
meta_description: How to unlock the Into the Unknown achievement in Stellaris (Windows). This achievement is worth 20 Gamerscore.
main_content: Stellaris (Windows) Achievements Into the Unknown achievement Stellaris (Windows) PC Game Pass 21,517 5,155 191 4.27* 3,636 1 (0%) 300-500.5h Lists Sign in or sign up to start making your own lists. Create a list Game 5 want to boost tracking their Stellaris achievements. Click here to track your progress. Add-on Overlord 1,327 250 11 4.17 143 10 (7%) Into the Unknown achievement in Stellaris (Windows) Into the Unknown As a Slingshot to the Stars empire, send 10 science ships into the unknown with Quantum Catapults. +1.0 1 guide Share How to unlock the Into the Unknown achievement Tears of Fenrir 25 May 2022 24 May 2022 25 May 2022 1 0 0 Actions This achievement can be combined with Yeet the Fleet . Start a new game with the Overlord DLC enabled and choose the Slingshot to the Stars origin story for your empire. The galaxy can be any size (smaller is easier), but choose no AI and one Fallen Empire. Only expand a minimal amount and focus primarily on repairing the Quantum Catapult. Once it is operational, send 10 Science Ships through it (for Into the Unknown ) and then build 50 corvettes (it is cheaper if you build them with no weapons or defenses). While you are building the corvettes, use your Science Ships to find the Fallen Empire if you haven't already. When your corvettes are ready, split the fleet repeatedly until they you have 50 fleets with 1 corvette each, and move them all to the system with the Quantum Catapult. Place a claim on the capital system of the FE and declare war. Exit the game and make a backup of your save file, and then start the game up again. Select all 50 single-corvette fleets, click on the quantum catapult option in the menu bar on the top fleet, and send the corvettes through the Quantum Catapult targeting the home system of the FE. If none of them land in the home system, exit, copy your backup save file to the savegame directory, and try again. Yeet the Fleet will unlock when one of your fleets lands in the capital system of the FE. Leave a comment Have you got any tips or tricks to unlock this achievement? Add a guide to share them with the community. Add a guide Do you have a question about this achievement? images.alt: Offline Mode - These achievements require play in game modes that do not necessitate a connection to any online services.
Single Player - These achievements can be obtained by a single player.
Cumulative + - These achievements are obtained by repeatedly performing the same action or set of actions over time.
